thread.title: Osage Beach customers
thread.title_full: Stair Supplies reviewed by Osage Beach customers

author: Osage Beach customers
title: Osage Beach customers
text: The product was satisfactory but the delivery and follow up was very poor. We had to personally pick up the product from our new home location 500 miles away and was promised a discount as well as shipping reimbursement that has not been paid. It's going on 6 months with no reply from the owner.
